name: Seed (ReddiumGames)
description:
Seed is a game prototype originally made for the Imagine Cup 2013 by Sophie Conchonnet, Jonathan Toti-Buttin, Hadrien Saiget and Xavier Tissot.

Music by Alexandre Travers & Clément Bencetti.
Sound design by Clément Duquesne.

Primarily designed for tablet it can also be played on Windows.

Seed (The adorable green character) is bouncing from left to right. To help it along his way to the end of the level you can use two tools.

A grapnel, which you can drag from Seed to its surroundings with the left mouse button to swing over obstacles. You can retract it by clicking again anywhere on the screen.

A gel, which you can create by dragging and dropping with the left mouse button on the screen. It will fall on the nearest surface and Seed will jump into it, allowing it to bounce higher.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also included with this release is the Level Editor we've used to create Seed.
It was made rather quickly, is pretty rough and may crash on you but it will give you the same tools we've had to create your own levels.
More details about how to use the Editor within the Editor folder.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

While we have taken some time to fix some bugs, this is still originally a student prototype and it may still have game breaking bugs and crashes.
If you experience any issue, feel free to report them but we cannot guarantee we'll be able to dedicate time to fix them.
